title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.17 - Electrical safety
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.17 - Electrical safety

State Regulations

All existing electrical service, wiring and fixtures shall be in good repair and safe condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-2.17

Amended

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
